forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy. Low around 54, with temperatures rising to around 57 overnight. South southwest wind 8 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8am. Mostly cloudy. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West wind 9 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As dusk settles over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle rain begins to dance upon the city streets, the cloudy sky casting a muted light reminiscent of a watercolor painting. The temperature hovers close to a breezy 54 degrees, with a subtle increase as the night unfolds. A south-southwest wind stirs the air, whispering through the alleys and echoing soft raindrops on rooftops, creating a soothing symphony that comforts those tucked indoors. The chance of precipitation remains high, with the promise of generous rainfall, adding a reflective quality to the evening.

Tomorrow, the forecast suggests a transition towards a mostly cloudy day, with the warmth of the earlier afternoon yielding to cooler air by day’s end. While the rain may ease before the sun peeks over the horizon, a hint of humidity will linger, lending a muted charm to the landscape. The likelihood of fog remains low, but the marine layer may touch the edges of the city, providing its signature ethereal blanket over the bay. For a stroll through the neighborhoods, layers will serve you well; a light jacket accompanied by an umbrella might just be your best allies against unexpected showers. As the evening draws on and the city glows with a soft luminescence, perhaps a quiet reading nook in a cozy café beckons, or a gentle walk along the waterfront will enchant those seeking solace in the rhythm of the rain.
